nodes.text: The Circle of Rest was a place in the Killik hive Saras on the planet Woteba, where UnuThul spoke with Han Solo, Leia Organa Solo, Saba Sebatyne, Mara Jade Skywalker, and Luke Skywalker in 36 ABY. It consisted of four egg-shaped monoliths arrayed in a semicircle with the open side facing the Garden Hall. Each of the monoliths had sheets of water rippling down the sides, and a hologram of a smiling Joiner child or pucker-mouthed Killik larva looking out from the inside.
